items.name: Animation
meaning: You cannot use actions with this <%= type 'LockoutGroup' %> group again until the animation completes.

items.name: Async
meaning: You cannot use actions with this <%= type 'LockoutGroup' %> group again for a period of time after the animation completes.

items.name: Sequence
meaning: This action has several <%= type 'Step' %>s that happen in sequence, no action will be possible until the full sequence completes or is interrupted.
